commit.message:
Merge pull request #761 from benguadesenlin/master

#90 #83 lab4

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,40 @@
+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical"
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    tools:context="com.bengua.whiteblock.Net1314080903206MainActivity" >
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/startsow"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/textView1"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:layout_marginTop="124dp"
+        android:text="开始踩白块" />
+
+ 	<TextView 
+ 	    android:id="@+id/textView1"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:layout_marginTop="23dp"
+        android:text="@string/game_name" 
+        android:textSize="32sp" />
+
+ 	<Button
+ 	    android:id="@+id/exit"
+ 	    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+ 	    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+ 	    android:layout_alignParentBottom="true"
+ 	    android:layout_marginBottom="32dp"
+ 	    android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/textView1"
+ 	    android:text="退出" />
+
+</RelativeLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:id="@+id/container"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    tools:context="com.bengua.whiteblock.Net1314080903206StepOnWhiteActivity"
+    tools:ignore="MergeRootFrame"
+    android:orientation="vertical" >
+    
+    <LinearLayout 
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal"
+		 >
+    	<TextView 
+        	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        	android:textSize="20sp"
+        	android:text="@string/now_score" />
+    	<TextView
+        	android:id="@+id/nowscore"
+        	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        	/>
+    </LinearLayout>
+    <LinearLayout 
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:orientation="horizontal" >
+    	<TextView
+        	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        	android:textSize="20sp"
+        	android:text="@string/best_score" />
+  	  	<TextView
+        	android:id="@+id/bestscore"
+        	android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        	android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        	/>   
+	</LinearLayout>
+	<LinearLayout 
+       	 android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+   		 android:orientation="horizontal" >
+        <TextView 
+     		android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+     		android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+     		android:text="@string/gametime"
+     		android:textSize="20sp"  />
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/showtime"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
+            android:text="游戏即将开始"
+             />   
+    </LinearLayout>
+	<com.bengua.whiteblock.Net1314080903206SowGameView
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="0dp"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:id="@+id/sowGameView" >
+    </com.bengua.whiteblock.Net1314080903206SowGameView>
+    <LinearLayout 
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        >
+  	  	<Button 
+  	  	    android:id="@+id/game_rule_button"
+  	  	    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+  	  	    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+  	  	    android:text="游戏规则" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+</LinearLayout>
